cast.original_title: What We Do in the Shadows
cast.overview: Vampire housemates try to cope with the complexities of modern life and show a newly turned hipster some of the perks of being undead.
cast.title: What We Do in the Shadows

details.biography: Actor Madeleine Sami won international acclaim starring in two Toa Fraser plays: 1998's Bare and solo show No 2. Aged 18, she debuted on screen on Shortland Street and Pio. Following Insiders Guide to Happiness, she played Oscar Kightley's romantic interest in Sione's Wedding. Sami went on to win an NZ acting award for Super City, in which she created and played multiple characters. In 2018 comedy The Breaker Upperers hit cinemas; Sami co-wrote, co-directed and co-starred with Jackie van Beek.
details.name: Madeleine Sami
